def: Defines the destination URL of the link.
Determines where the linked page or resourse will open.

values.name: _self
values.desc: Opens the link in the same frame or window (default behavior).

values.name: _blank
values.desc: Opens the link in a new tab or window.

values.name: _parent
values.desc: Opens the link in the parent frame.

values.name: _top
values.desc: Opens the link in the full window.

def: Provides additional information about the link, often shown when the mouse hovers over the element.
code: Visit Example

def: Specifies the relationship between current document and linked document. Useful for SEO and security.
code: Do Not Follow

values.name: nofollow
values.desc: Prevents the browser from sending the referrer information.
childrens: Preventing Spam: Stops spammy links from boosting their site's ranking.
Untrusted Content: Avoids endorsing untrusted sites with link value.

values.name: noopener
values.desc: Prevents the new page from accessing the `window.opener` property through javascript.
childrens: Security: Prevents the new page from controlling the original page.
Performance: Reduces overhead by preventing the new page from interacting with the original page.

values.name: noreferrer
values.desc: Prevents the browser from sending the referrer information.
childrens: Privacy: Prevents the new page from seeing where the link came from by not sending referrer information.
Security: Implicitly includes the benefits of rel="noopener", preventing the new page from accessing the original page.

def: Indicates that the link is for downloading a file.

heading: External Web Pages
def: Create a link to a external web page.

heading: Internal Links (within the same page)
def: Create a link to a specific page within the same website.

heading: Email Links
def: Opens the default email client with a pre-filled email address.

heading: Phone Links
def: Initiates a phone call on devices that support.
